Adult tritocerebral TC1 tachykinin neuro.Comment: Tachykinin expression was observed by in situ hybridization and immunostaining.
Adult tritocerebral TC1 tachykinin neuro.SuperCategory: Adult tachykinin neuron of the central nervous system
Adult tritocerebral TC1 tachykinin neuro.Definition: Adult neuron that expresses tachykinin (FBgn0037976), whose cell body is located in the tritocerebrum and which innervates, among other regions, the fan-shaped body. One cluster of around 16 cell bodies is found per hemisphere (Winther et al., 2003).
